channel.title: Promo on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Promo on Damien Saunders

item.title: You can follow me on Twitter
item.description: Did you know that social media is more than just blogs and RSS feeds? Well I hope so. I have a following on Twitter that is <— this BIG —> which is a lot for little me. Maybe you prefer Twitter because you can dip in to the Twitterstream - maybe you should try following me. What does Damien Saunders have to share on Twitter? Damien’s Twitter account is kept updated 24/7 with the latest headlines from across my Internet websites.

item.title: Top Posts March
item.description: Well that was the end of March! So in case you were living underground here are the most popular posts that you missed from last month: [wpp order_by=”views” pages=”0″ range=”monthly”] and just a reminder … there are lots of updated presentations for you to view (and download) - including How to Get Started with Foursquare

item.title: Remember to add my Google+ Page
item.description:
Now Google+ has launched pages for business … so if you’re using Google+ then please add Damien’s Google+ page.
I’ll be sharing the latest presentations and other news and marketing stuff only on my Google+ page.

item.title: Mailchimp makes e-mail marketing easy
item.description: ** Mailchimp** makes **e-mail marketing** easy - this Practical Guide will show you a process to follow to send your first e-mail marketing campaign. This Practical Guide will help you to understand lists, campaigns, templates and more … My latest presentation is for anyone who has already decided to use Mailchimp.

item.title: Merry Christmas to everyone .. make the most of it
item.description: Merry Christmas … I found this quote recently and I think it’s quite funny and timely Christmas is a time when kids tell Santa what they want and adults pay for it. Deficits are when adults tell the government what they want and their kids pay for it. ~Richard Lamm I hope you’re having a great day! wherever you are in the world - make the most of it.

item.title: Please add my Google+ page [PROMO]
item.description:
Now Google+ has launched pages for business … so if you’re using Google+ then please add the new page for White T-Shirt Digital
I’ll be sharing the latest presentations and other news and marketing stuff only on my Google+ page.

item.title: Google+ You can add me to your circles
item.description: Google+ is the new social network which has everybody talking. If you haven’t joined in yet, it’s nothing new. Except it’s all about you and me and everyone we know. So please add me to your circles and let’s get to know a bit more about each other. Have you added me to your Google+ http://damiens.ws/ql8xsS

item.title: Members Get it Free - Definitive Guide to Foursquare for 2011
item.description: The Definitive Guide to Foursquare has been updated for 2011 … and will be sent out this week. This guide contains all you need to know to get started with marketing using Foursquare. It covers: Statistics you need to know Ideas for making your business marketing with Foursquare better What key incentives you should have to reward Mayors Tips for tracking and monitoring much much more …

item.title: Are you following me ( on Twitter )
item.description: Did you know that social media is more than just blogs and RSS feeds? Well I hope so. I have a following on Twitter that is <— this BIG —> which is a lot for little ol’ me. Maybe you prefer Twitter because you can dip in to the Twitterstream - maybe you should try following me. What does Damien Saunders have to share on Twitter? Damien’s Twitter account is kept updated 24/7 with the latest headlines from across my Internet websites.

item.title: You can like me on Facebook too
item.description: Did you know that social media is more than just blogs and RSS feeds? If you’ve heard of Facebook - you might like to know that I have a fan page - so if you can like my page that would be great. By liking me — you’ll have daily updates from the latest news and stuff that is published on my website and you’ll be letting me know how much you like Facebook.

item.title: Special Offer - WordPress setup & hosting packages from £125
item.description: WordPressis one of the best solutions for social media marketingand possibly the world’s best solution for blogging and websites.If you’re looking to get started with WordPress - or need a new website tomorrow- then this offer is hard to miss:Next day Setup & Install WordPress £125.00 one-off setup fee.this offer includes: 12 Months Hosting Install the latest version of WordPress Using your own domain name Choose from one of the best WordPress themes via WooThemes Install 9 plugins for Forms, Spam, Database backup, Google Analytics, SEO, Social Media sharing & integrated marketing.
